<!-- Workshop Tabelle -->
```{r workshops}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

# get icons
GerFlagURL <- "https://cdn.countryflags.com/thumbs/germany/flag-round-250.png"
USAFlagURL <- "https://cdn.countryflags.com/thumbs/united-states-of-america/flag-round-250.png"
zoomLogoURL <- "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7b/Zoom_Communications_Logo.svg/1200px-Zoom_Communications_Logo.svg.png"
whiteURL <- "https://www.ict-solutions-events.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/plain-white-background-300x200.jpg"
r_logo_URL <- "https://github.com/SchmidtPaul/Schmidtpaul.github.io/blob/main/src/RStudio_logo.png?raw=true"
py_logo_URL <- "https://cdn.freebiesupply.com/logos/large/2x/python-5-logo-png-transparent.png"
sas_logo_URL <- "https://cdn.icon-icons.com/icons2/2699/PNG/512/sas_logo_icon_170761.png"

# import workshop excel
workshops <- read_excel(here("src", "workshops.xlsx")) %>% 
  select(-Title_forcedEng) %>% 
  mutate(across(Location, ~ str_remove(.x, "zoom"))) %>% 
  rename("Workshop Title" = Title)

# prepare flag icons
imgs_flag <- workshops %>%
  mutate(
    LangURL = case_when(
      Language == "Ger" ~ GerFlagURL,
      Language == "Eng" ~ USAFlagURL,
      T ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>% pull(LangURL)

# prepare zoom icons
imgs_zoom <- workshops %>%
  mutate(LogoURL = case_when(
    str_detect(Location, "via") == T ~ zoomLogoURL,
    T ~ whiteURL)
  ) %>% pull(LogoURL)

# prepare platform icons
imgs_platform <- workshops %>%
  mutate(PlatformURL = case_when(
    Platform == "R" ~ r_logo_URL,
    Platform == "Python" ~ py_logo_URL,
    Platform == "SAS" ~ sas_logo_URL,
    .default = whiteURL)) %>% 
  pull(PlatformURL)

workshops <- workshops %>% 
  mutate(Language = "", Platform="")

# handle duration bar
workshops <- workshops %>%
  mutate(
    Dur_lab = str_c("> ", Duration, "</span>"),
    Dur_val = str_remove(Duration, "h") %>% as.integer(),
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    Duration = pmin(25, Dur_val) %>% 
      color_bar("lightgrey")(.) %>% 
      str_replace_all(">\\d+</span>", Dur_lab)
  ) %>% 
  mutate(Duration = case_when(
    Dur_val > 24 ~ str_replace(Duration, "lightgrey", "darkgrey"),
    .default = Duration
  )) %>% 
  select(-starts_with("Dur_"))

# add BMEL hyperlink
workshops <- workshops %>%
  mutate(
    Location = str_replace_all(
      Location,
      c("Forschungseinrichtungen BMEL" = "<a href='https://biometrie-bmel.de/About'>Forschungseinrichtungen BMEL</a>",
        "Forsch.Einr. BMEL" = "<a href='https://biometrie-bmel.de/About'>Forsch.Einr. BMEL</a>")
    )
  )

# print table
tbl <- workshops %>%
  dplyr::select(-URL) %>%
  kbl(align = c("r", "l", "r", "r", "r", "l"), escape = F) %>%
  kable_minimal(
    full_width = T,
    font_size = 10,
    bootstrap_options = c("hover", "condensed")
  ) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "5em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "3em",
              image = spec_image(imgs_flag, 50, 50)) %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "3em",
              image = spec_image(imgs_platform, 50, 50)) %>% 
  column_spec(5, width = "20em",
              image = spec_image(imgs_zoom, 100, 20)) %>%
  column_spec(6, width = "5em")

tbl
```
